$(br) It looks like this dimension is perpetual day but its always freezing.$(br) This dimension is home to lots of large thick-coated fauna.$(br) Plenty of snow and spirit like enemies can be found here especially during the snow as they prefer to roam during colder weather.$(br) You might find much more detailed information if you read the Blue Journal you got from a Gatekeeper.

pages.title: Getting into the Everbright
pages.text:
If you are looking to get to this dimension you need to lay your hands on&n&l at least 10 Turquoise Stone Bricks and a Zeal Lighter obtained from a Gatekeeper &r.
  &oCorner blocks are completely optional but they would grant &2+5 to Aestetics&r stat if it exsisted
